modules.name: TuringMaschineRythm
modules.description: A probabilistic CV sequencer inspired by the original Music Thing Turing Machine. Generates semi-random looping sequences with adjustable probability and loop length.

modules.name: TuringGates
modules.description: An expander for the TuringMaschine module that outputs rhythmic gate patterns derived from the current sequence state. Useful for triggering drums, envelopes, or other events.

modules.name: TuringFlow
modules.description: An expander for the TuringMaschine that provides additional CV outputs based on bits of the sequence. Allows complex modulation and control signals derived from the main sequence.

modules.name: Tape Machine
modules.description: A detailed tape emulation module offering saturation, wow & flutter, bias shaping, and vintage tape coloration. Perfect for adding analog warmth and character to your sound.

modules.name: Ataraxic Iteritas Alia
modules.description: Massive hybrid tone generator that fuses polyBLEP oscillators, voltage-controlled combing, and evolving LF SR textures for brutal yet controllable timbres.

modules.name: Ahriman
modules.description: Stereo reverb inspired by Desmodus Versio with blend, tone, regen, modulation, density, and firmware-style FSU behavior for lush ambiences and haunted atmospheres.

modules.name: Leviathan
modules.description: Stereo techno-focused distortion inspired by Ruina Versio with wavefolding, DOOM suboctaves, multiband saturation, octavizing, phase warping, and the infamous Smoosh drive.

modules.name: Lilith
modules.description: 8-step expander and standalone lane for Sitri with per-step CV and gate modes.

modules.name: Lilith Advance
modules.description: 16-step expander and standalone lane for Sitri with per-step CV and gate modes.

modules.name: Nergal Amp
modules.description: Neural amp modeler that loads .nam captures with drive, tone, input, and output controls.
